alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Franklin, Crawford, northwestern Sebastian and northeastern Sequoyah Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Fern to 3 miles southeast of Mountainburg to near Short. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea to dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Alma... Mulberry... Dyer... Chester... Rudy... Lee Creek... Short... Lake Fort Smith... Figure Five... Fern... Kibler... Concord... Jethro... Shibley... Uniontown... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 30. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 326 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
